item.title: Party City files for bankruptcy and plans to shutter nationwide
item.description: Party City was once unmatched in its vast selection of affordable celebration goods. But over the years, competition stacked up at Walmart, Target, Spirit Halloween, and especially Amazon.

item.title: A pair of satellites will create artificial solar eclipses to study the sun
